name: Rotating Lightbox Gallery
author: Anil Sharma

sections.description:
This is a highly customizable jQuery Slider plugin. You can set its width, height, pagination and other
parameters. You can use it on your post or page via a schortcode [jQuery Slider] or in your template
file using php shortcode<?php echo do_shortcode('[Gallery]') ?>. or in editor [Gallery]

Slides can be added as post type slide from slides menu.

Tags: jQuery, Slider, Gallery, Plugin, Widget
Requires at least: 3.0
Tested up to: 3.3.2
Stable tag: 1.0
License: GPLv2

You can see its working demo here: http://www.inetbees.com/rotating-lightbox-gallery/
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin
  2. Upload the rotation-Lightbox-gallery folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2

Fixed some bugs in shortcode feature.

1.1

  • Automatically add “featured image” theme support to activated theme.
  • This version doesn’t give “Headers already sent…” error upon activation.
  • Available to be embedded into posts or pages via shortcode feature.
